results.title: Sex roles
results.creator_credit: It's About Time and Australia. Special Broadcasting Service
results.brief_description:
Episode number 10 of Series “Not suitable for adults”.
A program designed for teenagers which examines relevant issues facing adolescence. This episode looks at sex-role stereotyping and how conditioning and assumptions made about the differences between sexes, can affect teenagers in their choice of career and their social behaviours.

results.title: Sex role development (TEFC)
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Developmental psychology today”.
Examines the male and female sex roles, focusing on how stereotypes are formed. Discusses ways to avoid transmitting these traditional stereotypes to children. Suitable for upper secondary and teacher/tertiary levels.

results.title: Sex mission = Seksmisja [NTSC]
results.creator_credit: Polish Corporation for Film Production and Juliusz Machulski
results.brief_description: When Professor Victor Kuppelweiser wishes to test his cryogenic experiments for the first time on human beings he has two willing volunteers. Both scientists, a mis-matched pair Albert Starski and Maximilian Paradys (Jerzy Stuhr, Olgierd Lukaszewicz), are hoping for historical recognition and fame. But the experiment goes wrong and our heroes find themselves awoken (53 years later) by a post-nuclear society containing only women - who hate men. This slapstick comedy rather than implying any feminist critique pokes fun at totalitarianism, ironic in that the first-time director, Juliusz Machulski, made this film using state money in a communist country under martial law. A hilarious film that pokes fun at the values of the day by talking about tomorrow and borrows much of its stylings from films such as “Barbarella”, “The Sleeper” and thematically from films like “1984” and “Fahrenheit 451.”

results.title: Sex and Zen II
results.creator_credit: Golden Movies International, Wong Jing and Chin Man-Kei
results.brief_description: A surreal, offbeat and lush sequel to the original cult classic, this is the farcical story of a man whose lascivious escapades lead to serious trouble. In the process of arranging a liason for his son, the hero becomes involved with the ‘Mirage Woman’, unaware that she is a pursued criminal who extracts the essence of all her sexual partners and kills them. With four wives and the pick of all the women in the country, has he finally met his match? This is a humourous and colourful saga that continues the notoriously explicit style of the original. In Cantonese with english subtitles.

results.title: Sex and violence
results.creator_credit: Granada Television International and Linda McDoogall
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “World in action”.
The anti-rape movement in the United States is of concern to the feminist movement. Shows the activities of rape crisis centres and in particular deals with the activities of the organisation Women Organised Against Rape, which is based in Philadelphia, and handles l,000 rape cases a year.

results.title: Sex and Lucia = Lucia y el sexo
results.creator_credit: Sogecine, Alicia Produce, Canal+ Espana, Fernando Bovaira, Enrique Lopez Lavigne and Julio Medem
results.brief_description: Lucia’s life and her past merge when she is shocked by the death of her lover, a writer. Seeking answers to his death, she travels to an island idyll where she remembers but also makes new connections to a couple who have a past with her now dead partner. Visually stunning and erotically charged, this film is not just about sex but a search for truth, love and living life to the full. This arresting film by the maker of “Tierra” and “The Red Squirrel” is edgy, luscious and hot. Cast includes Paz Vega, Tristan Ulloa, Najwa Nimri, Daniel Freire. Warning: contains full frontal nudity and sex scenes. In Spanish with English subtitles.

results.title: Sex and gender
results.creator_credit: WGBH (Boston), Tuggelin Yourgrau and David Espar
results.brief_description:
Episode number 17 of Series “Discovering psychology”.
A person’s sex - male or female, is determined at birth, but gender - masculine or feminine, is largely a learned behaviour, determined by social and cultural expectations. This program examines the debate on how much of human behaviour is innate and determined biologically according to sex, and how much is the result of the individual’s cultural context.

results.title: Sex & Zen (E)
results.creator_credit: Golden Harvest, Johnny Mak Production Ltd, Johnny Mak and Michael Mak
results.brief_description: Based on the book “The Carnal prayer mat” which was banned for 400 years, this is a bawdy tale of the sexual adventures of a monk during the Ming Dynasty. Sexually explicit, this is considered to be on of China’s greatest erotic sagas. Cantonese dialogue with English subtitles. NOTE: At times the subtitles are difficult to read, this is due to the way the print has been filmed.

results.title: Sex
results.creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), National AIDS Campaign and John Eastway
results.brief_description: Sex is a program for young people. It deals in a fast, funny and frank way with relationships, sex, sexuality and sexual health in the context of HIV/AIDS and other sexually transmitted diseases (STDs). Issues covered include choosing/negotiating not to have any sexual activity at all; choosing not to have penetrative sex; exploring alternative sexual activities; STDs, including HIV, their symptoms, modes of transmission and prevention; using condoms. Written by Morris Gleitzman of “Mother and Son” fame.
